name: You Are The Monster (aka Get the Pizza)
name_original: You Are The Monster (aka Get the Pizza)
description:
You play as a monster that lives under a bed, but you need food! Travel the house to get all the pizzas while avoiding the pesky baby. Once you have eaten all of the pizza in the house, return to your home under the bed.

I would have liked to do more with this, but it's been a long time since my last game and I didn't prepare at all for this.

Controls: Arrow keys
